trans-unit.source: Represents the exception that is thrown when the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"></xref> is not able to complete a <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send*> or <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync*> operation.
trans-unit.target: Representerer unntak som er et når den <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"> </xref> kan ikke fullføre en <> </> *> eller <> </> *> operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A> property contains the status code returned by the SMTP server.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>egenskapen inneholder statuskoden returnert av SMTP-serveren.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The exception returned by this constructor has its <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A> property set to <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode>.
trans-unit.target: Unntak som returneres av denne konstruktøren har den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>egenskapen satt til <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode>.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref> class with the specified status code.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"> </xref> klassen med den angitte statuskoden.

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the `statusCode` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren bruker den `statusCode` parameteren til å initialisere den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref> class with the specified error message.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"> </xref> klassen med den angitte feilmeldingen.

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the `message` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren bruker den `message` parameteren til å initialisere den <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the error that occurred.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som beskriver feilen som oppstod.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref> class with the specified status code and error message.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"> </xref> klassen med den angitte koden og feil statusmeldingen.

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the `statusCode` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A> property and uses the `message` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren bruker den `statusCode` parameteren til å initialisere den <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>egenskapen og bruker den `message` parameteren til å initialisere den <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the error that occurred.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som beskriver feilen som oppstod.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref> class from the specified instances of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> classes.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"> </xref> klassen fra den angitte forekomsten av den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> og <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>klasser.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: This constructor implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface for the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren implementerer <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>grensesnittet for <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>klasse.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that contains the information required to serialize the new <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> som inneholder informasjonen som kreves for å serialisere den nye <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains the source and destination of the serialized stream associated with the new instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>som inneholder kilde og mål for serialisert dataflyt knyttet til den nye forekomsten.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref> class with the specified error message and inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"> </xref> klassen med angitte feilen meldings- og indre unntaket.

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the `message` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property and the `innerException` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren bruker den `message` parameteren til å initialisere den <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>egenskapen og `innerException` parameteren til å initialisere den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `innerException` is not `null`, the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles `innerException`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `innerException` er ikke `null`, oppstår det gjeldende unntaket i en catch-blokk som behandler `innerException`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the error that occurred.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som beskriver feilen som oppstod.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket er årsaken til den gjeldende unntaket.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance with the data needed to serialize the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fyller ut en <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> forekomst med dataene som kreves for å serialisere den <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Any objects included in the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> are automatically tracked and serialized by the formatter.
trans-unit.target: Alle objekter som er inkludert i den <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>automatisk sporet og serialiseres med formateringen.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> til å fylle ut med data.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that specifies the destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>som angir målet for denne serialisering.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets the status code returned by an SMTP server when an e-mail message is transmitted.
trans-unit.target: Henter statuskoden returnert av en SMTP-serveren når en e-postmelding overføres.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode"></xref> value that indicates the error that occurred.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode"> </xref> verdi som angir feilen som oppstod.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance with the data needed to serialize the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fyller ut en <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> forekomst med dataene som kreves for å serialisere den <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>, which holds the serialized data for the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>, som inneholder de serialiserte dataene for den <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains the destination of the serialized stream associated with the new <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>som inneholder målet for serialisert dataflyt knyttet til den nye <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"> </xref>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>
